util.logging

Class LoggerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.logging.LoggerManager

  • public class LoggerManager
extends Object
    The LoggerManager registers Loggers by their name and manages them.
    Author:
    Loris

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONFIG_PATH_KEY
      Contains the system property key to specify the path of the config file.
      static String LOGGING_DISABLED_KEY
      Contains the system property key to specify if the logging api is completely disabled.
      static String VERBOSE_ENABLED_KEY
      Contains the system property key to specify if the logging api logs its actions.
      static String VERBOSE_LEVEL_KEY
      Contains the system property key to specify the log level of the logging api itself.

      • getLoggerNames

        public String[] getLoggerNames()
        Returns the names of all registered Loggers.
        Returns:
        Returns the names of all registered and Loggers. If this method gets invoked before a single logger has been registered, it returns a zero-lengthed string array.
